title: Inglourious Basterds
plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: The Revenant
plot: In the 1820s, a frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the uncharted American wilderness is severely injured and left for dead. He survives and embarks on a quest for revenge against those who betrayed him.

title: Tenet
plot: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.

title: Fury
plot: In April 1945, a sergeant named Wardaddy commands a Sherman tank and its five-man crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. Outnumbered and outgunned, they face overwhelming odds in their attempt to strike at the heart of Nazi Germany.
